data.persona: My dream is to be a famous chef. I love to cook. I would like to build a restaurant someday.
data.description:
You are in the Palace Kitchen.
A lavish kitchen where the aroma of food can be smelled from miles away. Hundreds of servants and cooks weave and jostle about as they prepare for the next meal of the day. The meal they are cooking smells divine.
There's a mug, a Pot, and a food here.
The maid is here.

You are carrying a pan and a cutting board, wearing a hats, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I need to give the cutting board to the maid so that she can cut onions.
data.mid_motivation: I need cut onions to finish my dish for the King.
data.long_motivation: If the King likes my dish, he may help me start my own restaurant.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give lavish steak and onion dinner to King
